name: S-2010
title: OEPS Data Aggregated by State (2010)
description: This CSV aggregates all 2010 data variables from the OEPS v2 release at the State level.

fields.name: HEROP_ID
fields.description: A derived unique id corresponding to the relevant geographic unit.
fields.comments: The HEROP_ID is generated as follows: Summary Level Code + "US" + GEOID + “-” + Year. In the case of State geographies, Summary Level Code is 040 and GEOID is State FP .

fields.name: TotPop
fields.description: Estimated total population
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; 2010 Decennial Census; Integrated Public Use Microdata Service National Historic Geographic Information Systems
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: TotVetPop
fields.description: Total Veteran population
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates

fields.name: TotUnits
fields.description: Count of total housing units
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates; Social Explorer Historic Census Data on 2010 Geographies
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from Social Explorer at county level and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: WhiteP
fields.description: Percentage of population with race identified as white alone
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; 2010 Decennial Census; Integrated Public Use Microdata Service National Historic Geographic Information Systems
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: OtherP

fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; 2010 Decennial Census; Integrated Public Use Microdata Service National Historic Geographic Information Systems
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: DisbP
fields.description: Percentage of civilian non institutionalized population with a disability
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimate; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates; Integrated Public Use Microdata Service National Historic Geographic Information Systems
fields.comments: Data from 2000 Census downloaded at county level from NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: NoHsP
fields.description: Percentage of population 25 years and over without a high school degree
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimate; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates; Integrated Public Use Microdata Service National Historic Geographic Information Systems
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: VetP
fields.description: Percent of population that are veterans
fields.source: American Community Survey 2013-2017 5 Year Estimate; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates

fields.name: UnempP
fields.description: The number of unemployed individuals as a percentage of the civilian labor force
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates; Social Explorer Historic Census Data on 2010 Geographies
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from Social Explorer and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: PovP
fields.description: Number of individuals earning below the poverty income threshold as a percentage of the total population
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates; Social Explorer Historic Census Data on 2010 Geographies
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from Social Explorer and aggregated upwards.

fields.name: MedInc
fields.description: Mean income for individuals in the past 12 months (in 2018 inflation-adjusted dollars)
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates

fields.name: PciE
fields.description: Per capita income for individuals in the past 12 months (in 2018 inflation-adjusted dollars)
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates

fields.name: GiniCoeff
fields.description: Income Inequality (Gini Coefficient)
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates

fields.name: VacantP
fields.description: Percentage of vacant housing units
fields.source: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates; Social Explorer Historic Census Data on 2010 Geographies
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from Social Explorer and aggregated upwards.
